dialogue.introduction: Yeah yeah yeah! Finally, Kinu has arrived!
dialogue.library_intro: Born in Kobe, I'm Kinu! I trained well at the Maizuru School. After lots of dangerous things happened, I did my best in the Southwest... Well, that was bad too. Kuma-chan was suprisingly helpful too. But... Panay Island was seriously panai!
dialogue.secretary1: When I look at the Admirals face, I get all motivated~
dialogue.secretary2: I will work hard again today, too.
dialogue.secretary3: Hm, what's up? Why don't we sweat it out together?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Admiral~ Aren't we going to train or anything?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral~! Shall I give you a shoulder massage? Or perhaps, some training?
dialogue.wedding: Admiral! We're always just training together, maybe that's a signal that we should spend some more time together… maybe… haa.. Eh?! No, I didn't mean it in that way, I mean that I since I'm nearest to you, I should protect you… I want to… yeah… ah, whatever!
dialogue.show_players_score: What, the report? Lemme see, lemme see!
dialogue.equipment2: Anti-aircraft weaponry is very important, you know?
dialogue.equipment3: All you can do is practice!
dialogue.expedition_selection: All you can do is practice!
dialogue.resource_collection: All you can do is practice!
dialogue.instant_repair: All you can do is practice!
dialogue.development: All you can do is practice!
dialogue.supply: This way I can do my best again.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: After a battle, isn't a bath just great?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ah, I've had it... I'm going to rest for a bit~!
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like the repair is complete.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Oooi, Admiral~! The fleet has returned~
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Alright, I'll show you the results of my training.
dialogue.battle_start: Adapt to changes while maintaining formation. Let's go!
dialogue.night_attack: Enemies on the port, take this!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Enemies on the port, take this!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Enemies on the port, take this!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Enemies on the port, take this!
dialogue.mvp: This victory is the result of the practice battles, yes. I will continue to work hard, Admiral!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Kinu won't sink with just this.
dialogue.sunk: Admiral, sorry, looks like this is it for me... please withdraw the other girls...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: We maaaade it, Two years, You know Kinu is happy, cheers with you and the fleet.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It's rainy season. Seems like almost everyday is raining~. Ah, let's play Shiritori to kill our time! Let's see, Teitoku(Admiral), Ku... Kuchikukan(Destroyer)... Ah, It's over!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: So hot.... So it's already summer.... Summaht. (buzzing cicada sounds) Huh? That's no good?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Summer is definitely all about festivals, right? A naval base summer festival. Let's get this work done quick and start preparing!
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn is different for everyone, isn't it? What about you, admiral? I suppose for me autumn is a time when I put extra effort into making people laugh! Hey, what's with that face?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Uh, here's a haiku. "Spending time alone, together with Admiral, in the night of Yule"* Just kidding! Ahahaha! Ehehehe! Eh, heh, heh... It wasn't funny? It wasn't!?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: So much thing happened this year. You're good this year, Admiral. Hope next year you'll be a good Admiral as well.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! Admiral! Let's promptly start the New Year in serious panai!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Gwaaaargh!! Why? Why is everybody throwing beans at me!? Ow! Owowowow!

hourly.0100: 1 o'clock!. I'm going to sleep soon, 'kay? G'night~
hourly.0200: It's 2 o'clock. It's the middle of the night, how scary~!
hourly.0300: It's 3 o'clock... I really want to go to sleep....
hourly.0500: It's 5 o'clo~ck! Gonna get up? Gonna sleep?
hourly.0600: It's 6 o'clock. Let's do our best today as well!
hourly.0700: It's 7 o'clo~ck! What'cha doing for breakfast?
hourly.0900: It's 9 o'clock! Where 'ya goin? Take me with you~♪
hourly.1000: It's 10 o'clock now, why are you tired?
hourly.1100: 11 o'clock! ..... What should we do for lunch?
hourly.1300: It's 13 o'clock. Let's take it a bit easier, okay?
hourly.1700: 17 o'clock announcment~. You musn't be careless, Admiral!
hourly.1900: It's 19 o'clock! Well then, it's almost time!
hourly.2000: 8 o'clock! All members.... No, I didn't say anything! Nothing at all!
hourly.2100: 21 o'clock huh... Is it okay if I go in the bath first?
hourly.2200: It's 22 o'clock. It's Kancolle time, no? Yeah, yeah!
hourly.2300: It's 23 o'clock. Honestly, that Sendai is just so noisy!
